block.p: LEHMAN BROTHERS HOLDINGS, New York, named Larry Wieseneck, head of convertible securities underwriting, to the additional post of co-head for United States capital markets, with James Miller.
OPENTABLE.COM, San Francisco, named Jeffrey B. Edwards chief executive. He had been president and chief executive at Micros-Fidelio, the international unit of Micros Systems.
LEHMAN BROTHERS HOLDINGS, New York, named Larry Wieseneck, head of convertible securities underwriting, to the additional post of co-head for United States capital markets, with James Miller.
OPENTABLE.COM, San Francisco, named Jeffrey B. Edwards chief executive. He had been president and chief executive at Micros-Fidelio, the international unit of Micros Systems.

RELATIVITY TECHNOLOGIES, Research Triangle Park, N.C., named Michael J. Espina to the vacant position of president and chief operating officer. He had been senior vice president for global professional services at Computer Associates.
